alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 20 at 3:10AM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 431, 433, 435, 436 AND 437... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 433, 435, AND 436... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 433, 435 and 436. * WIND...West to northwest 25 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 15 to 18 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. The combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
